text:
Hey folks,

I've jotted down a few Twitter automation ideas which you can implement using tools like Zapier.

Here's the thread - <https://twitter.com/rohit_chavane/status/1346033733623709696>

<https://twitter.com/rohit_chavane|@rohit_chavane>: Hey #MarketingTwitter :wave:

Here are some awesome Twitter automation ideas you can start using & get the most out of it!

These workflows can be implemented using tools like <https://twitter.com/automate|@automate> & <https://twitter.com/zapier|@zapier> 

P.S. Be authentic & do not spam the platform while using these. :pray:
